trans-unit.source: Provides the basic functionality for propagating a synchronization context in various synchronization models.
The <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext> class is a base class that provides a free-threaded context with no synchronization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext> 동기화 없는 자유 스레드 컨텍스트를 제공 하는 기본 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The purpose of the synchronization model implemented by this class is to allow the internal asynchronous/synchronous operations of the common language runtime to behave properly with different synchronization models.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스에서 구현 하는 동기화 모델 목적은 다른 동기화 모델을 올바르게 동작 하도록 공용 언어 런타임 내부 동기/비동기 작업을 허용 하는 것입니다.

trans-unit.source: This model also simplifies some of the requirements that managed applications have had to follow in order to work correctly under different synchronization environments.
trans-unit.target: 이 모델도 일부 관리 되는 요구 사항을 간소화 응용 프로그램에 따라 다른 동기화 환경에서 올바르게 처리 해야 했습니다.

trans-unit.source: Providers of synchronization models can extend this class and provide their own implementations for these methods.
trans-unit.target: 동기화 모델의 공급자는이 클래스를 확장 하 고 이러한 방법에 대 한 직접 구현을 제공할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about synchronization contexts, see the article [It's All About the SynchronizationContext](http://msdn.microsoft.com/magazine/gg598924.aspx) in the MSDN Magazine.
trans-unit.target: 동기화 컨텍스트에 대 한 자세한 내용은 문서 참조 [the SynchronizationContext에 대 한 모든 것이](http://msdn.microsoft.com/magazine/gg598924.aspx) MSDN Magazine의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Inheritors must have <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPolicy" /> and <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />.
trans-unit.target: 상속자 참고 사항 있어야 <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPolicy" /> 및 <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext" /> class.
The default constructor performs no parameter initialization.
trans-unit.target: 기본 생성자 없음 매개 변수 초기화를 수행합니다.

trans-unit.source: Inheritors must have <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPolicy" /> and <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />.
trans-unit.target: 상속자 참고 사항 있어야 <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPolicy" /> 및 <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates a copy of the synchronization context.
A new <see cref="T:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext" /> object.
The default implementation returns an empty <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext> object.
trans-unit.target: 기본 구현은 반환 하는 빈 <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the synchronization context for the current thread.
A <see cref="T:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext" /> object representing the current synchronization context.
trans-unit.target: 현재 동기화 컨텍스트를 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext" /> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is useful for propagating a synchronization context from one thread to another.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 다른 스레드 간에 동기화 컨텍스트를 전파 하는 데 유용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines if wait notification is required.
<see langword="true" /> if wait notification is required; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
When overridden in a derived class, responds to the notification that an operation has completed.
The default implementation contains no code.
trans-unit.target: 기본 구현에 코드가 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: You can optionally override this method to provide code that executes when an operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 필요에 따라 작업이 완료 되었을 때 실행 되는 코드를 제공 하려면이 메서드를 재정의할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, responds to the notification that an operation has started.
The default implementation contains no code.
trans-unit.target: 기본 구현에 코드가 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: You can optionally override this method to provide code that executes when an operation starts.
trans-unit.target: 필요에 따라 작업이 시작 될 때 실행 되는 코드를 제공 하려면이 메서드를 재정의할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback" /> delegate to call.
The object passed to the delegate.
When overridden in a derived class, dispatches an asynchronous message to a synchronization context.
The <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext.Post%2A> method starts an asynchronous request to post a message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext.Post%2A> 메서드는 메시지를 게시 하는 비동기 요청을 시작 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback" /> delegate to call.
The object passed to the delegate.
When overridden in a derived class, dispatches a synchronous message to a synchronization context.
The <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext.Send%2A> method starts a synchronous request to send a message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext.Send%2A> 메서드 시작 동기 요청 메시지를 보내려고 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The method was called in a Windows Store app.

The implementation of <see cref="T:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext" /> for Windows Store apps does not support the <see cref="M:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext.Send(System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback,System.Object)" /> method.
The <see cref="T:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext" /> object to be set.
Sets the current synchronization context.
Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 직접 실행 호출자에 대 한 완전 신뢰가 필요 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 부분적으로 신뢰할 수 있는 또는 투명 코드에서 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets notification that wait notification is required and prepares the callback method so it can be called more reliably when a wait occurs.
An array of type <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> that contains the native operating system handles.
<see langword="true" /> to wait for all handles; <see langword="false" /> to wait for any handle.
The number of milliseconds to wait, or <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" /> (-1) to wait indefinitely.
Waits for any or all the elements in the specified array to receive a signal.
The array index of the object that satisfied the wait.
The <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext.Wait%2A> method calls the external declaration <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext.WaitHelper%2A> to perform the wait activity.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext.Wait%2A> 메서드 호출 외부 선언 <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext.WaitHelper%2A> 대기 작업을 수행 하기.

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext.Wait%2A> method to change the wait behavior for the synchronization context.
trans-unit.target: 재정의 <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext.Wait%2A> 동기화 컨텍스트에 대 한 대기 동작을 변경 하려면 메서드.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> is null.
Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 직접 실행 호출자에 대 한 완전 신뢰가 필요 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 부분적으로 신뢰할 수 있는 또는 투명 코드에서 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> that contains the native operating system handles.
<see langword="true" /> to wait for all handles; <see langword="false" /> to wait for any handle.
The number of milliseconds to wait, or <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" /> (-1) to wait indefinitely.
Helper function that waits for any or all the elements in the specified array to receive a signal.
The array index of the object that satisfied the wait.
<xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext.WaitHelper%2A> is a declaration for an unmanaged external helper function.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext.WaitHelper%2A> 관리 되지 않는 외부 도우미 함수에 대 한 선언입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext.WaitHelper%2A> is called by the <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext.Wait%2A> method to wait for a signal for the specified operating system handles.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext.WaitHelper%2A> 에 의해 호출 됩니다는 <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext.Wait%2A> 메서드는 지정 된 운영 체제 핸들에 대 한 신호에 대해 기다려야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 직접 실행 호출자에 대 한 완전 신뢰가 필요 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 부분적으로 신뢰할 수 있는 또는 투명 코드에서 사용할 수 없습니다.
